### General Summarization 

- "Summarize the key provisions and objectives of this bill."
- "List the main changes introduced compared to the previous law."
- "Identify penalties and explain who they apply to."

---

### Audience-Specific Summaries
- "Summarize this bill for a legislator with limited time."
- "Draft a summary suitable for the general public."
- "Explain the bill’s impact on [stakeholder group]."

---

### Analytical & Comparative
- "Compare this bill to the previous version — highlight key differences."
- "List potential implementation challenges or controversies."
- "Identify international best practices reflected in the bill."

---

### Extractive Tasks
- "Extract sections mentioning penalties or fines."
- "List updated or added definitions."
- "Find clauses related to data protection or privacy."

---

### Simplification & Talking Points
- "Rewrite key points as bullet points for a speech."
- "Generate three talking points in favor of the bill."
- "Summarize into a brief for social media or press release."
